short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My developer assistant tool allows you to work beautifully every day with simple but effective tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension add tools for developer like disable code auto translation or add a copy button on each predefined elements which contain code in your visited page.

It disable auto translation on predefined elements which contain code, it do it on all tags <pre> or all elements with the "code Â» class. You can personnalize this extension with your list of tags, classes or ID in the settings page.
